languages.text: "Шерин, я не смела бы беспокоить вас вновь, если бы не то астропатическое сообщение с Футфола. Молю звездами от Сегментум Соляр до проклятых окраин Простора: выслушайте мою просьбу! Я буду ждать вас там же, где и всегда".

"Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."
languages.original_text: "Шерин, я не смела бы беспокоить вас вновь, если бы не то астропатическое сообщение с Футфола. Молю звездами от Сегментум Соляр до проклятых окраин Простора: выслушайте мою просьбу! Я буду ждать вас там же, где и всегда".

"Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

"Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

languages.text: « Shereen, je peux vous assurer que sans ce message astropathique de Castel, jamais je n'aurais osé revenir vous ennuyer. Au nom de toutes les étoiles du Segmentum Solar à la maudite bordure des Étendues, je vous supplie d'écouter ce que j'ai à vous dire ! Je vous attends à l'endroit habituel. »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, je peux vous assurer que sans ce message astropathique de Castel, jamais je n'aurais osé revenir vous ennuyer. Au nom de toutes les étoiles du Segmentum Solar à la maudite bordure des Étendues, je vous supplie d'écouter ce que j'ai à vous dire ! Je vous attends à l'endroit habituel. »

languages.text: "Shereen, ich hätte Euch nicht mehr behelligt, wenn ich nicht diese astropathische Nachricht aus Footfall erhalten hätte. Im Namen aller Sterne im Segmentum Solar bis zu den verfluchten Rändern der Ausdehnung bitte ich Euch, mich anzuhören. Ich warte an der üblichen Stelle auf Euch."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, ich hätte Euch nicht mehr behelligt, wenn ich nicht diese astropathische Nachricht aus Footfall erhalten hätte. Im Namen aller Sterne im Segmentum Solar bis zu den verfluchten Rändern der Ausdehnung bitte ich Euch, mich anzuhören. Ich warte an der üblichen Stelle auf Euch."

languages.text: “亲爱的，如果不是因为落脚港的星语者给我发来了消息，我绝对不会再打扰你了。我以太阳星域到科罗努斯扩区所有恒星的名义发誓，我请求你听我把话说完！我会在老地方等你。”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，如果不是因为落脚港的星语者给我发来了消息，我绝对不会再打扰你了。我以太阳星域到科罗努斯扩区所有恒星的名义发誓，我请求你听我把话说完！我会在老地方等你。”

languages.text: «Shereen, no volvería a molestarle si no fuera por el mensaje Astropático de Paso. En nombre de todas las estrellas, desde el Segmentum Solar hasta los confines malditos de la Extensión, ¡le ruego que me escuche! L{mf|e|a} esperaré en el lugar habitual».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, no volvería a molestarle si no fuera por el mensaje Astropático de Paso. En nombre de todas las estrellas, desde el Segmentum Solar hasta los confines malditos de la Extensión, ¡le ruego que me escuche! L{mf|e|a} esperaré en el lugar habitual».

languages.text: 「シャリーン、フットフォールからの感応通信メッセージがなかったら、二度とあなたを煩わせることはなかったんだけど。日輪の宙域からエクスパンスの呪われた辺境まで、すべての星の名において、私の話を最後まで聞いてほしいの！いつもの場所で待ってるわ」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、フットフォールからの感応通信メッセージがなかったら、二度とあなたを煩わせることはなかったんだけど。日輪の宙域からエクスパンスの呪われた辺境まで、すべての星の名において、私の話を最後まで聞いてほしいの！いつもの場所で待ってるわ」

languages.text: "Şirinim, Binliman'dan gelen o Astropatik mesaj olmasa seni katiyen tekrar rahatsız etmezdim. Segmentum Solar'dan Enginlik'in meşum uçlarına kadar tüm yıldızlar adına, beni bir dinle! Her zamanki yerimizde bekliyor olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I would never have bothered you again if not for that Astropathic message from Footfall. In the name of all the stars from the Segmentum Solar to the accursed fringes of the Expanse, I ask you to hear me out! I will be waiting for you at the usual spot."
